p: Toluene HPLC-grade solvent (Sigma-Aldrich, 99.9%, Darmstadt, Germany) was used to dillute linalool and estragole analytical standards (Sigma-Aldrich, 99.9%). Standard solution of alkanes (C 7–C 30) (49451-U, Supelco, 99.0%), was also purchased from Sigma-Aldrich. Working solutions at the appropriate concentrations were prepared directly from the stock solutions of the standards and used for the construction of analytical curves of linalool and estragole. All standard solutions were stored at −18 °C.
